description: Detects enumeration of local system groups Author: Ömer Günal, Alejandro Ortuno, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Local Groups Discovery
query: ((process.executable:*\/dscacheutil AND process.command_line:*\-q* AND process.command_line:*group*) OR (process.executable:*\/cat AND process.command_line:*\/etc\/group*) OR (process.executable:*\/dscl AND process.command_line:*\-list* AND process.command_line:*\/groups*))
